data.message: Eminem need to Collab with Hopsin!

replies.message: isso seria insano, Eminem é um grande rapper
Nah, hopsin is corny
noooooope
Eminem hopsin & chris webby would be dope AF
Eminem need to collab with Nas and Rakim, DJ Premier will be the producer
Nah hop tries to bite ems style
I couldn't think of a better pair than Eminem and Hopsin.
Em and Logic would fit
Hopsin is wack af. The best collab is bad meets evil. so stop. em n royce are god.

Lol, anyone who says they don't like Hop because he "bites off Em's style" is a fucking retard. Since when did inspiration become 'theft of style'?

#StillMovin #FunkVolume

Hopsin is corny. 
No one put in enough work yet to have a chance to work with Eminem. 
IF anything, the only person who could is probably Jarren.

Hopsin is raw af yall need to get wit realness. Eminem is the best spitter ta me but when it comes down to getting big independently and stayin real and not being afraid to call out anybody including the government you gotta give hop respect he killin shit. But again em is the best spitter tho
kkkkkkkkkkkkkk hopsin is shit
people who say hopsin is corny are probably listening some Young Fag  and Chief  beef!
Gab who? never heard of them. Phillip Reno, learn english. When he gets some real bars we'll talk. Royce is the wingman. deal with it.
Who's Hopsin??? Another black man with a tan. Who eats his daily food in a can. Like a dog in a van. Fvck Hopsin. Eminem and Eric Cartman would be better.

Hop is corny because he doesn't put on any bullshit about himself to sell copies.... yeah right. Produces his own shit? Check. Writes his own shit? Check. Owns half of his own independent label? Check. Did it all without a deal? Check.

Remind me how he's corny?
You're Damn right!!!
Hopsin
Damien Dame Ritter
Funk Volume
Jacob White Those reasons you just listed got nothing to do with corniness. I like Hop but it's some of the lines he says or the hooks on his tracks.

Why does it matter if a hook is corny if the verse is 100% straight fire every time?

Really, why is that any hook that isn't 'hard' is corny?

 I mean, the vocal hooks might not be for everyone, but nobody can debate his lyricism is right up there with Killer Mike and El P.

Just watch, when #PoundSyndrome drops... shit's going to get real.

I also said lines. Some of the punchlines he says are too. It's the same with Eminem. I'm not saying being corny at times is bad. It tends to work with Hopsin because of his style and big influence from Eminem.
Hopsin had enough of u guys shit
